feature_model.name: DATA INTERFACES
feature_model.feature_tree: :r DATA INTERFACES (f_DATA_INTERFACES) :m POWER SUPPLY (f_POWER_SUPPLY) :m DEMULTIPLEXER and DESCRAMBLING (f_DEMULTIPLEXER_and_DESCRAMBLING) :m YM_Test (f_YM_Test) :m CONDITIONAL ACCESS (f_CONDITIONAL_ACCESS) :m TUNER and CHANNEL DECODING (f_TUNER_and_CHANNEL_DECODING) :m PROCESSOR and DATA STORAGE (f_PROCESSOR_and_DATA_STORAGE) :m AUDIO and VIDEO DECODING (f_AUDIO_and_VIDEO_DECODING) :m SECURITY (f_SECURITY) :o USB (f_USB) :o Wifi (f_Wifi) :o Power Line Control (f_Power_Line_Control)
